mapper.select: select m_f_idx,mf.m_idx,mf.c_idx, m_name from mood_filter mf inner join mood m on m.m_idx = mf.m_idx where c_idx=#{ c_idx }
select df.d_f_idx,df.d_idx,df.c_idx,d.d_name from dessert_filter df inner join dessert d on df.d_idx = d.d_idx where c_idx=#{ c_idx }
select c.*, round((select nvl(avg(r_star),0) from review where c.c_idx = c_idx),1) as r_star_avg from (select * from cafe order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) c
select * from cafe where c_name like '%' || #{ search_text } || '%'
